name: Mildew
description:
A wolf family drama with a deadly blight in the background and also some demons.

If you'd like to leave feedback, here's a form you can fill in.

Warning for possibly disturbing content (there's some blood, cannibalism and gooey monster).

~5000 words, ~100 images, 3 endings, playthrough about 40 minutes.

The game also has a prequel in a comic form, but it's a separate story, so you don't have to read it to understand what's going. 

Huge thanks to CastleGraphics for stock photography that I used for art and to Black Hill and Cousin Silas for their CC BY-NC 3.0 licensed music.

Hit me up if you encounter any problems. It's my first game ever, so I hardly know what I'm doing, so there might be problems.
